title: Customized Chest Texture
briefDescription: This pack allows you to change the normal chest texture into any 8 textures of your choice! Just select the one you like from the resource ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This pack allows you to change the normal chest texture into any 8 textures of your choice! Just select the one you like from the resource pack settings! NOTE!! This pack does not ADD new chests to the game! Only allows you to change into the 8 wooden plank textures!
When enabling this pack in your resource packs, CLICK on the resource pack settings [gear] and select what wooden chest texture you will like!

Do you think that Minecraft Bedrock is not controller friendly? Minecraft bedrock controller tooltips is not like Minecraft console edition where controller tooltips have cleaner looks. Workstations ( smithing table, grindstone etc..)

title: Colored Nether Portal
briefDescription: Have you ever looked at a nether portal and thought that it would be better as a different color? well, this texture pack is for ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Have you ever looked at a nether portal and thought that it would be better as a different color? well, this texture pack is for you because it lets you change the color of the nether portal in Minecraft!
This texture pack lets you change the color of the nether portal in Minecraft!
This texture pack colors can be changed in the resource pack setting.
The picture below is where the resource pack setting is.

After you click the button it popups a screen that lets you choose what color you what your nether portal to be!
Scroll the bar to choose different options, then when you have what you want you can close the settings and play on your world!

These are the colors of the nether portals that this texture pack adds.
There are going to be more colors added to the texture pack in the future.
nether portal Color: Green
nether portal Color: Red
nether portal Color: Pink
nether portal Color: Yellow

title: Multiplayer+
briefDescription: This texture pack strives to improve and alternate the core Minecraft game, changing minimal things to make a big impact. It is focused mainly around ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This texture pack strives to improve and alternate the core Minecraft game, changing minimal things to make a big impact. It is focused mainly around the Nether update and the amount of multiplayer that will be happening. It is a lightweight, simplistic pack that will in no doubt improve your experience. If you have any suggestions, comment down below. This pack was heavily influenced by other packs and by the Vanilla Tweaks pack for Java, however, all of the textures themselves are original and some are even taken from my other pack, Eclipsed Bedrock.
A brief overview of most of the tweaks are seen here in this photo;
Normal and Trapped Chest
Clearer Portal
Red Flower Iron Golem
Lower Shield

title: Farmland Side Resource Pack
briefDescription: As the title says, this resource pack adds the side of farmland to make it look sooo much better instead of that ugly dirt. This ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
As the title says, this resource pack adds the side of farmland to make it look sooo much better instead of that ugly dirt. This pack will fix just that.
It works with both dry and wet farmland. If you don?t know how to get farmland, just use a hoe on grass or dirt and you?ll get it. This adds a texture to the side of farmland.
It will have the same texture on all 4 sides but that isn?t fixable.

title: Scoreboard Modifier
briefDescription: Scoreboard Modifier does a similar job to the Java Edition mod Scoreboards. Scoreboards mods are usually found within Java Edition clients, and I decided to ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Scoreboard Modifier does a similar job to the Java Edition mod Scoreboards. Scoreboards mods are usually found within Java Edition clients, and I decided to port it on Bedrock Edition. It can do 3 things; Hide the red numbers, make the scoreboard font smooth, and make the scoreboard background transparent.
Creator: light#8318, Discord Server This feature is also present inside the Astral Client. I made this as a separate pack so people have more options to choose. To use Scoreboard Modifier with Astral Client, put this pack above.
(Default)

title: Mystic Pack
briefDescription: This pack is not finished yet, but I'll update it soon. The purpose of this pack is to change every block and item to make ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This pack is not finished yet, but I?ll update it soon. The purpose of this pack is to change every block and item to make minecraft a more realistic and ?medievalish? game. It makes the game even more immersive. There is no way to describe this pack, it is different from all the other packs! If you are looking to try something new, this pack is for you!
Hope you like it!

title: Less Intrusive Minecraft
briefDescription: This resource pack adds a lot of features to improve your game experience by making stuff less intrusive, for example better glass, scaffolding, nether portals, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This resource pack adds a lot of features to improve your game experience by making stuff less intrusive, for example better glass, scaffolding, nether portals, and a lot of other features! The pack is very light and optimized for low end devices. Feature list below! Enjoy! By DerpyPlayz18. Gamertag: D3rpyPlayz18
Features list:
Rain and is more transparent to improve view during rain and/or storms. Snow included.
Now glass is clearer! Feature from my Clearer Glass texture pack.
You can see everything with a carved pumpkin on your head:
Improved visibility trough and in nether portals:
Made an hole on scaffolding to improve your building experience:
Now ice is clearer like glass (Perfect with shaders):
Now slime and honey blocks are more transparent:

title: Eclipsed Bedrock
briefDescription: This is a simple texture pack that makes Minecraft a bit more enjoyable. It changes some of the annoying and highly contrasting textures, such as ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is a simple texture pack that makes Minecraft a bit more enjoyable. It changes some of the annoying and highly contrasting textures, such as grass, gravel, or diorite. It also includes more functional and quality of life changes like smaller particles or a slightly transparent pumpkin overlay.
Functional observers.
HD snow texture.

title: No Arms Armor Stands
briefDescription: This pack removes the arms of armor stands. For those people who like to build decorative structures using armor stands or for those who just ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This pack removes the arms of armor stands. For those people who like to build decorative structures using armor stands or for those who just dislike the arms this is the pack for you!
The texture for the armor stands was ported by me from Java Edition. That?s how I managed to make this pack.

title: Invisible Armor Stand Base
briefDescription: This pack was created for a friend for a world he had been working on. It very simply, as you can probably guess, a pack ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This pack was created for a friend for a world he had been working on. It very simply, as you can probably guess, a pack that removes the armor stand base. It looks surprisingly better than the default and is super lightweight. This is my first pack so let me know what you think.

title: Shadow?s Pack V3 ? Music Update
briefDescription: At first, this was a texture pack I made for a friend, but I decided to post it online. I haven't finished adding things! The ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
At first, this was a texture pack I made for a friend, but I decided to post it online. I haven?t finished adding things! The goal of this pack is to have a pack If you want new things to be added in the pack, you can tell me in the comment section and I will answer your comments.
This texture pack modifies the vanilla textures for pvp and to make the default minecraft look better without making to much modifications.
What?s in the pack?
? Shorter swords and a smaller totem of undying to get a better idea of the surroundings.
? Outlined ores so you don?t miss ores in the dark.
? New ore blocks.
? The bow has 3 different colors, depending on how far back you pull the bow.
? .Flashy and bigger textures to differentiate textures.from each other. (Golden apple, ender pearl, shears, enchanted books, arrows, diamond, lower grass)
? Custom potions to differentiate them from each other.. (Fire resistance, poison, regeneration, speed, invisibility, jump boost, harming)
? Sun and Moon in 3 dimensions.
? Simpler and better icons to navigate easily and faster in your inventory and options.
? New black background when you look at items in your inventory instead of the ugly purple one. ? Custom hearts when you have poison effect or wither effect. New defense points. ? The slots are numbered from 1 to 9. ? Outlined trapped chest. ? Cutom music discs. (Replacing cat, stal, mall, blocks, 11, 13, ward, wait and far) (New) ? The crossbow has 3 different colors, depending on how far back you pull it. (New)
